import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{listProducts}from"../actions/productActions";import{detailsUser}from"../actions/userActions";import LoadingBox from"../components/LoadingBox";import MessageBox from"../components/MessageBox";import Product from"../components/Product";import Rating from"../components/Rating";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SellerScreen(props){var params=useParams();var sellerId=params.id;//const sellerId = props.match.params.id;
/*getting userDetails from the redux*/var userDetails=useSelector(function(state){return state.userDetails;});var loading=userDetails.loading,error=userDetails.error,user=userDetails.user;/*getting productList from the redux*/var productList=useSelector(function(state){return state.productList;});var loadingProducts=productList.loading,errorProducts=productList.error,products=productList.products;var dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(function(){dispatch(detailsUser(sellerId));dispatch(listProducts({seller:sellerId}));},[dispatch,sellerId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-1",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingBox,{}):error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageBox,{variant:"danger",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"card card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"row start"/*for Logo*/,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"small",src:user.seller.logo,alt:user.seller.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"p-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:user.seller.name})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{rating:user.seller.rating,numReviews:user.seller.numReviews})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"mailto:".concat(user.email),children:"Contact Seller"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:user.seller.description})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-3",children:loadingProducts?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoadingBox,{}):errorProducts?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageBox,{variant:"danger",children:errorProducts}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[products.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageBox,{variant:"danger",children:"No Products Found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row center",children:products.map(function(product){return/*#__PURE__*/ (/*Showing products according to the product.id*/_jsx(Product,{product:product},product._id));})})]})})]});}
